mapper.insert: insert into g_picture (PICTURE_ID, GOODS_ID, BUSINESS_ID, THUMB_IMG, REAL_IMG, ORIGINAL_IMG, LINK_URL, WIDTH, HEIGHT, SORT_ORL, STATUS, IS_MASTER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, PIC_DESC) values (#{pictureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortOrl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isMaster,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
